1: I sing a new song celebrating marvelous victories.
2: I witness and share the joy of salvation and righteousness.
3: I see the salvation of God everywhere.
4: I joyfully sing and celebrate with everyone around me.
5: I joyfully sing with my harp and voice.
6: I celebrate joyfully with music before my King.
7: I embrace the beauty and vibrancy of the world around me.
8: Nature rejoices in harmony and joy.
9: The Lord judges the world with righteousness and fairness.
